bibl.title: Callimachus' Iambi and Aitia.
bibl.note: The deliberate linking of Callimachus' Aitia and Iambi invites us to read the Iambi as a specific development of the Aitia, yields new explanations for some Iambi and suggests several points about the date and composition of the two collections.
bibl.seg: Clayman Dee Lesser, Callimachus' Iambi and Aitia.

The deliberate linking of Callimachus' Aitia and Iambi invites us to read the Iambi as a specific development of the Aitia, yields new explanations for some Iambi and suggests several points about the date and composition of the two collections.
